sqlList.sql: select nvl(count(tlu.login_mobile), 0) AS ALLCOUNT from t_lm_user tlu where tlu.devicetoken IS NOT NULL

select nvl(count(tlu.id), 0) AS ALLCOUNT from t_lm_user tlu where tlu.platform_code='IOS' and tlu.version >= '3.2' and tlu.THIRD_PARTY_ID IS NULL and (tlu.regchanel_code is null or tlu.regchanel_code <> 'QUNAR')

select nvl(count(ult.login_mobile), 0) AS ALLCOUNT from t_lm_usergroup up inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ult on up.id = ult.usergroup_id inner join t_lm_user tlu on tlu.login_mobile = ult.login_mobile AND tlu.devicetoken IS NOT NULL inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:UserGroups, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:UserGroups) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:UserGroups, ',', ''))) dt on up.id=dt.commlist

select nvl(count(ult.id), 0) AS ALLCOUNT from t_lm_usergroup up inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ult on up.id = ult.usergroup_id inner join t_lm_user tlu on tlu.id = ult.login_mobile AND tlu.platform_code='IOS' and tlu.version >= '3.2' and tlu.THIRD_PARTY_ID IS NULL and (tlu.regchanel_code is null or tlu.regchanel_code <> 'QUNAR') inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:UserGroups, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:UserGroups) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:UserGroups, ',', ''))) dt on up.id=dt.commlist

select id, login_mobile, sign_key, htk_flg, sign_flg, sign_date, deviceid, createtime, version, devicetoken, regchanel_code, platform_code, last_verify_time, weibo_account, third_party_id, third_party_vendor, push_status,CLIENT_CODE from t_lm_user WHERE login_mobile=:USERID
